name: S.O.N
description: Players will experience an epic psychological horror game set in modern day. You play as Robert Alderson in search of his missing son Jay who went missing deep in the Pennsylvania forest, better known as South Of Nowhere. In a world where fear takes control over everyone and your past is never erased. What fears and demons will you face to get back your loved ones? Players will travel through the most dangerous and most well known forest in the world. Clarencaster. Known for being beautiful and breathtaking with aurora lights and bright stars, Clarencaster has its dark side and not so pretty side. Locals have given it the its famous name "South Of Nowhere". The southern most tip of Clarencaster aka South Of Nowhere has also been home to over 500 dissappearences in 2016 alone. Players will also travel through the caves of Stacy, the caves located miles underneath the southern most tip of Clarencaster. Not too much is to be said about the caves. As no one has ever seen what is inside.
